In order to provide all Lowcountry residents and municipalities with the safety and certainty they deserve, I am asking Governor McMaster to issue a statewide stay-at-home order immediately.

I know firsthand how easily #COVID„Éº19 can be caught and spread. While my symptoms are mild and improving, many others aren't so lucky. It's on all of us to flatten the curve and keep frontline workers healthy, so we can save lives and return to normal as soon as possible.

NEW: I'm calling on Governor @henrymcmaster to issue a statewide stay-at-home order.  The AG's recent opinion that only the Governor can issue stay-at-home orders has caused real confusion in the Lowcountry and forced towns to weigh keeping residents safe > costly legal action.
